heif.boxes

Class ItemInformationBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • heif.boxes.Box
      • heif.boxes.FullBox
        • heif.boxes.ItemInformationBox

  • public class ItemInformationBox
extends FullBox
    Represents the iinf (Item Information Box), which describes items within the HEIF file. This is often used to locate EXIF metadata, thumbnails, or other auxiliary images.

    Specification Reference: ISO/IEC 14496-12:2015, Pages 81â€“83.

    API Note: Additional testing is required to validate the reliability and robustness of this implementation.

    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

    • Constructor Detail

      • ItemInformationBox

        public ItemInformationBox(Box box,
                          ByteStreamReader reader)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Parses the ItemInformationBox from the specified reader.
        Parameters:
        box - the parent box header
        reader - the sequential byte reader for HEIF content
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • Method Detail

      • getEntry

        public java.util.Optional<ItemInfoEntry> getEntry(int itemID)
        Retrieves the ItemInfoEntry matching the given itemID.
        Parameters:
        itemID - the item ID to search for
        Returns:
        an Optional containing the matching entry if found, otherwise Optional.empty() is returned

      • getItemType

        public java.lang.String getItemType(int itemID)
        Returns the item type for a specific item ID.
        Parameters:
        itemID - the ID to look up
        Returns:
        the 4-character type (i.e. "Exif", "mime") or an empty string if not found

      • findEntryByType

        public ItemInfoEntry findEntryByType(java.lang.String type)
        Finds the first entry matching a specific item type string.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of item entry to find
        Returns:
        an ItemInfoEntry entry if found, otherwise null

      • getBoxList

        public java.util.List<Box> getBoxList()
        Returns the list of ItemInfoEntry entries defined as (infe) contained in this box.
        Overrides:
        getBoxList in class Box
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of ItemInfoEntry objects in reading order

      • logBoxInfo

        public void logBoxInfo()
        Logs the box hierarchy and internal entry data at the debug level.

        It provides a visual representation of the box's HEIF/ISO-BMFF structure. It is intended for tree traversal and file inspection during development and degugging if required.

        Overrides:
        logBoxInfo in class FullBox
